info.title: db-reservationmanagement-service API
info.description: Handles hotel reservation workflow for guests and staff, using secure reservation codes for guest self-service and cross-referencing guest, room, payment, package, and special request data.

201.description: Response JSON represents the most comprehensive form of the **reservation** object in the response. However, some properties may be omitted based on the object's internal logic.

400.description: The request was improperly formatted or contained invalid parameters, preventing the server from processing it.

401.description: The request lacked valid authentication credentials or the credentials provided do not grant access to the requested resource.

404.description: The requested resource was not found on the server.

500.description: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

get.summary: The listReservations API has no parameters.
